text: as Thanksgiving draws near you might be
thinking or you should be thinking that
it's time to replace that canned sweet
potato with marshmallows thing you've
been enjoying your entire life well I
agree and I have the answer for you this
is a real sweet potato peeled for those
of you who have never seen one before
and there are like thousands of things
you can do with it I'm gonna show you
one right now we're focusing on grated
sweet potatoes because there is no
faster way to cook sweet potatoes then
by grating them first so get your sweet
potato peeled cut off this nasty little
end and this not so nasty little N and
cut it into pieces it's a tough bugger
that will fit in the feed tube of your
food processor not sure anything could
be easier than that so you have your
beautifully grated sweet potatoes and
you don't need to use a food processor
obviously if you grate them by hand
they'll look something like this for
this particular recipe we're gonna make
sauteed or if you like stir-fried sweet
potatoes with olive oil garlic butter
and sage get a pan hot put it a little
olive oil couple tablespoons throw in a
couple of these and see if it's ready
just about we want a real sizzle here
and then
you can make this into a cake which I'm
not gonna do you can add white potatoes
you can add egg but this is the absolute
simplest possible thing and on the other
end for the not exactly sauce but
drizzle that's gonna go on top we're
gonna slowly cook a lump of butter with
a couple of cloves of crushed garlic
more than that and some lovely sage
leaves let's keep them whole because you
can use them as a garnish when you're
done when the butters done it's gonna be
bubbly just browned not blackened at all
but the color of a nut the French call
it beurre noisette which means nut
butter okay looks like it's ready time
to serve so a nice mound of your sweet
potatoes this was five minutes start to
finish so just so you know definitely a
couple of sage leaves and a quite
wonderful browned butter compared to
this can sweet potatoes with

this is serious food really great
